display_long_description:
Get ready to catch chaos in Ruffnauts: Planet Pals — the ultimate pet collecting, loot-grabbing, gadget-blasting VR sandbox game. Explore strange planets, blast enemies with ridiculous gadgets, and battle bizarre monsters alongside your pet squad. 

Play solo or with friends in constantly evolving biomes. With weekly updates, there's always something wild (and probably explosive) around the corner.

Why Players Love Ruffnauts:
🐾 Catch & Evolve Chaos-Creatures
Toss your capture cube and tame 60+ wild pets — from robots to flying dragons. Feed them tacos, grow them into beasts, and ride them into ridiculous encounters.

🔫 Gadgets That Break the Rules
Launch yourself with a Power Fist, pull friends off cliffs with a Grapple Gun, or drop portals into lava. Every tool is made to mess with physics and your friends.

🌍 Planets = Playgrounds
Climb trees, bounce on sheep, glide between floating islands — each spherical planet is a new biome full of loot, traps, and surprises.

🎮 Sandbox Mayhem with Friends
Join 10 player lobbies and battle, explore, or build chaos your way — with creatures, gadgets, or pure creative nonsense.

🌀 Weekly Drops
New creatures. New gadgets. New chaos. Every week.
